title: EventType
description: An activity that can be scheduled as an event on the calendar zero or more times.

id.description: The unique id of this event type, autogenerated in the database.

name.description: The name of this event type.

description.description: A longer description of the event type.
description.example: This shift is from 8:15am-11:00am. You will be helping prep and serve food to our clients! You will be on your feet moving the whole time so come with close toed shoes and appropriate clothes for the tasks. Sometimes requires minor heavy lifting.
